attributes.action: High premiums on car insurance because of postcodes, use individual circumstances instead ie no claims, age, NOT POSTCODE!!
attributes.additional_details: For quite some time now car insurance premiums are being quoted on postcodes given instead of personal circumstances. If you live in certain postcodes then the premiums are fr a good driver with 10 yr no claims are much higher than a driver with 2 claims in a different postcode. This needs to stop and the individuals history be taken into account instead.
